articles.description:
Chris Sutton has defended Celtic after journalist Ian Ladyman questioned why Brendan Rodgers returned to the Hoops.
In an article he wrote last week for the Daily Mail, Ladyman expressed his opinion that Rodgers is squandering his best years as a manager at Celtic. However, Sutton disagreed with Ladyman's remarks.
The post Chris Sutton launches furious defence of Celtic against "badly wrong" English criticism appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Chris Sutton launches furious defence of Celtic against "badly wrong" English criticism

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers highlighted Luis Palma and Hyunjun Yang for praise after their performances in Celtic's 6-0 destruction of Aberdeen. 
Yang and Palma, who both joined Celtic in the summer, were both able to get on the scoresheet yesterday in a sensational performance from the Hoops, with Palma also registering a hat-trick of assists.
The post "You see the development"; Brendan Rodgers comments on emerging Celtic duo bode very well appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: "You see the development"; Brendan Rodgers comments on emerging Celtic duo bode very well

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Former Celtic goalkeeper Packie Bonner hailed Celtic's character after an incredible 6-0 win against Aberdeen saw the Bhoys go eight points clear at the top of the Scottish Premiership.
Celtic dominated Aberdeen from start to finish in their biggest win of the season despite the announcement of Daizen Maeda's injury on Friday. 
Hyunjun Yang opened the scoring for Celtic just nine minutes into the game, with Kyogo Furuhashi adding another after 16 minutes. Although they had to wait just over 60 minutes for their third goal, the Bhoys were clearly the dominant side and could have won the game by an even greater margin.
The post BBC Sportsound pundit raves about Celtic after routing Aberdeen with two standouts highlighted appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: BBC Sportsound pundit raves about Celtic after routing Aberdeen with two standouts highlighted

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Former Celtic defender Kolo Toure has revealed he knew that Celtic would go unbeaten in the 2016/17 season. 
Toure also went unbeaten in the 2003/04 Premier League with Arsenal, making him a historic player for having gone unbeaten in seasons with Celtic and Arsenal, an incredible feat which neither side has since been able to replicate.
The post Kolo Toure's brilliant comments on Celtic in new interview appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Kolo Toure's brilliant comments on Celtic in new interview

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Andriy Lunin's wife Anastasia has provided an update on her husband's future at Real Madrid with the Ukrainian shot stopper linked with a move to Celtic.
Lunin, who joined Real Madrid in 2018, has failed to secure a spot as the number one goalkeeper during his time at the club. He was said to be disappointed with the summer signing of Kepa Arrizabalaga on loan from Chelsea after a training ground injury to Thibaut Courtois.
The post Celtic transfer target sounds ready for a change of club appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic transfer target sounds ready for a change of club

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers has urged for VAR to be abandoned criticizing the way it is used to referee matches.
Rodgers' comments follow Daizen Maeda's red card against Atletico Madrid on Tuesday, which left Celtic down to 10 men for the majority of the match.
The post Celtic boss makes bold comments on refereeing appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic boss makes bold comments on refereeing

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Former Celtic striker John Hartson has defended Daizen Maeda after his sending off on Tuesday night against Atletico Madrid, even describing the sending off as harsh.
Hartson spoke of the negative effect the red card had on Tuesday's match, which meant that Atletico were able to take full advantage of gaps all over the pitch with Celtic down to 10 men Atletico scored five goals after Maeda's sending off.
The post John Hartson says a lot of things "conspired against Celtic" this week appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: John Hartson says a lot of things "conspired against Celtic" this week

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Former Celtic defender Mark Wilson has questioned Brendan Rodgers' tactics following Daizen Maeda's sending off against Atletico Madrid on Tuesday. 
Maeda was sent off in the 23rd minute, and Rodgers decided against making any substitutions until half-time despite being down to 10 men. Instead, the Northern Irishman employed a 4-3-2 formation with Luis Palma and Kyogo Furuhashi up front for the Bhoys.
The post Former Bhoys defender questions Brendan Rodgers' tactics after red card in 6-0 loss  appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Former Bhoys defender questions Brendan Rodgers' tactics after red card in 6-0 loss

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Liam Scales labelled Celtic ‘naive’ after Tuesday’s 6-0 defeat to Atletico Madrid left the Hoops on the brink of exiting the Champions League.
Celtic currently sit bottom in Group E, having earned just one point after four games. With just two matches remaining, they face an uphill battle for a chance to advance to the knockout stages.
The post Celtic star gets honest after dire mid-week defeat appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic star gets honest after dire mid-week defeat
